title: Understanding Date Formatting
text: To format numbers as dates in a spreadsheet, you need to use the date formatting option. This is usually found under the 'Home' tab in most spreadsheet applications.

title: Locating the Date Button
text: The date button is typically located in the 'Number' section of the 'Home' tab. It allows you to change the format of selected cells to display dates.

hintAnswer: select the range to format, and click the date button under home tab
title: Steps to Format Dates
text: Follow these steps to format numbers as dates:
choices: select the range to format, and click the date button under home tab
select the range of format, and click "/"
type "/" in front of each cell
